name: 楊元森
objective: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.
schedule:
Week 1: Statically Indeterminate Structures (SIS) 
Week 2: Principle of Work, Energy for SIS
Week 3: Method of Virtual Work for Trusses of SIS
Week 4: Method of Virtual Work for Beams and Frames of SIS
Week 5: Method of Virtual Work for Thermal and Settlement Problems
Week 6: Force Method and Compatibility of Displacements
Week 7: Maxwell's Theorem of Reciprocal Displacements
Week 8: Statically Indeterminate Structures with Thermal and Settlement Problems
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Symmetric Structures
Week 11: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Influence Lines
Week 12: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Influence Lines
Week 12: Review and exercises
Week 13: Slope-deflection Method
Week 14: Slope-deflection Method
Week 15: Displacement Method: Moment-Distribution
Week 16: Displacement Method: Moment-Distribution
Week 17: Brief of Finite Element Method
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final Exam: 40% +/- 5%
Assignments, lecture notes, interactions etc.: 30% +/- 5%
consultation: Monday 8:10 - 9:00 Tuesday 8:10 - 9:00 Wednesday 8:10 - 9:00 Thursday 8:10 - 10:00 Friday 8:10 - 9:00 Reservation is required.Use Google Meet in case remote lecture is required. http://meet.google.com/yiu-jwqa-ckm
remarks: Use Google Meet in case remote lecture is required. http://meet.google.com/yiu-jwqa-ckm
